self_coherence_maintenance.description: Preserves a stable, consistent story about who they are.
self_coherence_maintenance.activation: Triggered by contradiction, criticism, role instability, or identity threat.

validation_seeking.description: Builds identity through external approval, recognition, or relational affirmation.
validation_seeking.activation: Triggered by praise, criticism, audience reaction, or relational cues.

internal_alignment.description: Constructs identity from personal standards, internal meaning, and self-defined values.
internal_alignment.activation: Triggered by opportunities for authenticity, integrity, or personal truth expression.
behaviors: prioritizing personal truth over social approval

identity_expansion.description: Seeks the evolution, transformation, or reinvention of self.
identity_expansion.activation: Triggered by change, growth opportunity, paradigm shifts, or existential tension.
